tool_description: Get location information about an IP address,Get ASN information, GET Firewall information, GET IP Address Ranges information, GET Domain information , GET Domain IP history information , GET  list Domain By ASN, Country,Ranges information
name: IPFinder.io
title: IPFinder.io

api_list.name: list Domain By ASN, Country,Ranges
api_list.description: Get  list Domain By ASN, Country,Ranges

required_parameters.name: select_by
required_parameters.description: AS number as (e.g. AS1) or country ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. US) or Organization name

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com/domainby/DZ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com/domainby/{select_by}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IP Address Ranges
api_list.description: Our IP address ranges API will return a list of all of the IP addresses ranges assigned to or operated by a company, identified by the Organization name. So, you provide a Organization name, and we return all of the IP address ranges in CIDR format that belong to that company.

required_parameters.name: orgname
required_parameters.description: Organization name convert into URL encoding URL encoding

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com/ranges/Telecom Algeria"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com/ranges/{orgname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ipfinder-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ASN details

api_list.name: Firewall
api_list.description: Do you want to block visitors by country or AS number ?

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: formats supported are apache_allow, apache_deny,nginx_allow,nginx_deny, CIDR, linux_iptables, netmask, inverse_netmask, web_config_allow, web_config_deny, cisco_acl, peer_guardian_2, network_object, cisco_bit_bucket, juniper_junos, microtik

required_parameters.name: by
required_parameters.description: AS number as (AS1) or country ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g. US)

api_list.name: IP address details

required_parameters.name: ipAddress
required_parameters.description: The API supports passing in a single IPv4 or IPv6 IP address

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: available format json jsonp php xml
